title: Songs For Summer
description: In this special episode, Sam presents a collection of interviews with musicians, featuring songs that are perfect for summer: the spacey soul-pop of Nick Hakim, the flowery, unhurried R&B of Syd and her band The Internet, and the eighties-colored pop of Emily King. Email the show at samsanders@npr.org.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Songs For Summer
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: We present songs for your summer  —  featuring interviews with artists whose music is perfect for the poolside or a long, slow drive with the windows down.
itunes:subtitle: We present songs for your summer  —  featuring interviews with artists whose music is perfect for the poolside or a long, slow drive with the windows down.

Email the show at samsanders@npr.org.
